resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;">Detail of an illuminated pear-shaped medallion containing the word <em style="color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;">khams<span style="color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;"> in gold <em style="color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;">kufic<span style="color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;"> script indicating the end of a fifth verse (<a style="color: #0066ff; text-decoration-line: none; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;" href="http://access.bl.uk/item/viewer/ark:/81055/vdc_100057226629.0x000001?&_ga=2.197703151.1933841716.1642607444-1458020893.1630496159#?c=0&m=0&s=0&cv=319&xywh=0%2C-1637%2C6162%2C12061" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">BL Add MS 22412, f. 156v<span style="color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;">)
resource.chars: Detail of an illuminated pear-shaped medallion containing the word khams in gold kufic script indicating the end of a fifth verse (BL Add MS 22412, f. 156v)
